title: Textual Element Impact
description: Analyzing textual elements of a recipe to determine the magnitude of impact on user engagement and ratings. Report Link

title: Hunter Industries Specification Market Analysis
description: In order to better understand Hunter's market share, we needed to find out more about its specification rate. Since we lacked crucial information about the overall size of the specification market, my role was to develop a method for more accurately estimating the monetary value of Hunter's specification rate within the irrigation sector. Specifically, I focused on projects from 2023 valued at $1 million or more as this was the first full year of "normal" data post-pandemic. Report Link

title: Glycograph
description: This project explores how daily glucose trends differ among individuals with normal, prediabetic, and diabetic glucose levels. Through interactive visualizations and physiological data, you'll learn how blood sugar behaves throughout the day, what factors influence it, and how it relates to overall health. Project Link

title: Airbnb Data Mining Challenge
description: Ranked in the top 20 out of 100+ participants in an Airbnb price prediction challenge by developing machine learning models, engineering features, handling missing data, and tuning for minimal RMSE. Leaderboard Link

title: Predicting Median Salary Across the United States
description: As students are actively searching for their first job, one of the most sought-after questions is: How much will the salary be? Individuals seek higher education in chances to secure a job with a higher salary, and with the world becoming more technologically driven, certain jobs tend to be on the higher salary spectrum. In this report, we delve deep into LinkedIn job postings to analyze job listing characteristics (location, industry, experience, work type, and company) that can most accurately predict the median annual salary. Report Link

title: Analyzing Grocery Stores and their Nutritional Value

image.alt: Visualization of Nutritional Value (Target vs. Walmart)

description: As a college student, eating regular, nutritious meals can be difficult due to our busy schedules. The majority of us transition from getting meals from our parents to being on a meal plan, then to planning our meals. For days when I want a quick, easy meal, I want to know which store would provide the best nutritious meal. As UC San Diego students, we have both a Target and a Whole Foods that are readily accessible to us due to proximity, therefore, I decided to focus on those two stores to help determine where students should purchase their next prepared meal.

title: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualization
description: Visualizations can easily be manipulated depending on how the data is processed. This project delves deep into ethical analysis and visualization and explores the process of creating a graph to support both sides of a personal proposition. Report Link

title: Bikewatching
description: This website provides an interactive map visualization of bike traffic in the Boston area, focused on different times of the day. Website
